title: THAIFEX - Anuga Asia
description:
THAIFEX – Anuga Asia is set to welcome all local and international participants at IMPACT Muang Thong Thani, Bangkok, Thailand, from 24-28 May 2022! With Thailand's relaxation of the TEST & GO entry scheme by the Centre for COVID-19 Situation Administration (CCSA), the countdown for THAIFEX – Anuga Asia 2022 has begun! The team has also implemented comprehensive safety measures in response to the current COVID-19 situation and is committed to making the show a safe and successful business platform for all participants. This year, THAIFEX – Anuga Asia will be raising the bar by offering: 
• Valuable networking opportunities with our Hosted Buyers and Priority Club Buyers. 
• Access to Asia’s top business contacts pre-during and post-show through our 2022 exhibitors listing and mobile app. 
• Insights into new and emerging F&B breakthroughs with THAIFEX – Anuga Start-Up and our brand new segment THAIFEX – Anuga Future Food Market! 
• Regardless of where you are on the F&B industry spectrum, THAIFEX – Anuga Asia 2022 is a must-attend in-person, 5-days event to seize more market share. See you on 24 - 28 May 2022! วันเจรจาธุรกิจ: วันที่ 24-27 พฤษภาคม 2565 เวลา 10:00-18:00 น. 
วันจำหน่ายปลีก: วันที่ 28 พฤษภาคม 2565 เวลา 10:00-20:00 น.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
